    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>b9bf4db5-22a5-11d8-9145-94b98de51532#1#15</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A nagy francia forradalom</string>
            <string language="en">The Great French Revolution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Große Französische Revolution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Grande Révolution Française</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Volta Francesa Grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rivoluzione Francese Grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μεγάλη γαλλική επανάσταση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Gran Revolución Francesa</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A nagy francia forradalom monarchikus szakasza</string>
            <string language="en">Monarchic part of the Great French Revolution</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emberi jogok,  Emberi és Polgári Jogok Nyilatkozata,  Condorcet,  XVI. Lajos,  La Fayette,  </string>
            <string language="en">bills of right, Humane and Civilian Rights Statements, Condorcet, Lewis XVI. La Fayette</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Monarchic Teil der großen Französischen 
Revolution</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Partie monarchique de la grande révolution 
française</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Peça de Monarchic da volta francesa grande</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parte di Monarchic della rivoluzione francese 
grande</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Monarchic μέρος της μεγάλης γαλλικής επανάστασης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pieza de Monarchic de la gran revolución 
francesa</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verfassungen, menschlich und Zivilisten berichtigt 
Anweisungen, Condorcet, Lewis XVI. La Fayette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les déclarations des droits, humanitaire et le civil 
redresse des rapports, Condorcet, Lewis XVI. La Fayette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">as contas de direita, humano e de civil endireitam 
indicações, Condorcet, Lewis XVI. La Fayette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">le fatture della destra, umanitario e del civile 
radrizza le istruzione, Condorcet, Lewis XVI. La Fayette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογαριασμοί των σωστών, ανθρωπιστικών και πολιτικών 
δηλώσεων δικαιωμάτων, Condorcet, Lewis XVI. Λα 
Fayette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">las cuentas de la derecha, humano y del civil enderezan
las declaraciones, Condorcet, Lewis XVI. La Fayette</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
